question: When was the ICC World Cup first hosted outside England?
oriSent: The tournament was first hosted outside England in 1987, when India hosted the event.

question: Who won the ICC World Cup when it was first hosted outside England?

question: Who was the main sponsor of the ICC World Cup when it was hosted outside England for the first time?
oriSent: The main sponsor of the tournament was the Indian government, who provided financial support and infrastructure for the event.
